replies.author: mxp00001111
replies.txt_content:
升级到Windows 2008 x64,然后在开服.bat用TXT打开那里写上"C:\Program Files(x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xincgc -Xmx8G -jar mc.jar
PAUSE
@echo OFF
:restart
title [mc]
"C:\Program Files(x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe"  -Xincgc -Xmx8G -jar mc.jar
goto restart
pause
